price: Akwai daga mutãne* wanda yake yin musũ ga sha'anin Allah bã da wani ilmi ba, kuma yanã biyar kõwane Shaiɗan mai taurin kai.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّرِيدٖ
footnotes: * An raba mutãne a game da addĩni kashi huɗu, sa'annan ya fãra da kashi na farko mafi yawa daga cikin sauran kasũsuwan, watau kashin wãwãye mãsu biyar Shaiɗan ga al'ãdu da son zũciyõyi su bar hukunce-hakuncen Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min wayattabiʿu kulla shayṭānin marīdin
